resources.string: The following permissions are required for the app to work correctly. Click on start button to allow permissions.
This permission is required to let apps opt-in to show notifications via user consent.
This permission is used to enable the app to appear on top of other applications.
This permission is required to enable the app to capture audio for displaying the music visualizer.
This permission is required to enable advanced features and security measures in the app.
Lock screen on click with Device Policy Manager API
